message: Let's start with a fair split. Take it or leave it.
You were too generous in round 1, now it's my turn to make a better offer!
You think I was too generous? You're trying to take the cake!
I'm willing to compromise. Take it or leave it!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about compromising, let's see if you'll take this offer!
You think I'm not serious? Bring your best game, Bob!
Let's meet in the middle. It's getting serious now!
